name: Tech Recruiter
description:
Drishticon is a California-based vendor / outsourcing company that provides services to IT companies in the US and other countries.


Drishticon is looking for a global Tech Recruiter to join our remote talent acquisition team.

We work on sourcing of top quality talent both from local US/India market and also globally from anywhere including Canada, Europe, Africa to name a few.

We are helping our customers build next-generation IT Solutions company using distributed teams and high caliber talent working from anywhere in the world.

Requirements:

3+ years of experience in Technical Recruitment to fill contract and full time positions for following or other similar IT roles

    1. Java developers, DOTNET developers, Front end engineers, Backend engineers, Fullstack developers,
    2. Data Engineers, Data scientists, ML/AI engineers,
    3. Automation engineers, DevOps Engineers, Cloud Migration engineers
    4. Technical project managers, Scrum masters, Business Analysts and Product Managers.
    5. Packages Salesforce, ServiceNow, Hybris, ATG, Sterling OMS, Tibco, Kafka etc

Good understanding of Compensation models for contracting and hourly or full time employment in USA or Russia or India

Experience working thru the full recruitment lifecycle – searching, screening, interview coordination, negotiation, onboarding to the project.

Familiarity with US employment types H1B, GC, EAD, and also W-2 and C2C engagement models

Fluent in written and spoken English. English will be the main business communication language

People friendly – easy to speak with, inter-personable and makes friends easily.



We offer
Part time/Full-Time Job options
Remote work
Preferred hours of work - PT, or at least 4 hours of intersection with California business hours
Attractive compensation plan with base and commissions
